tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_security_event_logs ( 
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_id UUID NOT NULL, 
    event_type VARCHAR(50), 
    event_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    event_description TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_description VARCHAR(255),
    device_id INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE device_security (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(100),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    device_status VARCHAR(20),
    last_checked TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IoT_Devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    security_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE Security_Events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_time TIMESTAMP,
    device_id UUID,
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SIEM_Alerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_time TIMESTAMP,
    event_id UUID,
    alert_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
	system_id UUID,
	device_id UUID,
	device_name VARCHAR(255),
	device_type VARCHAR(50),
	device_ip INET,
	PRIMARY KEY (system_id, device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE events (
	event_id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	system_id UUID,
	device_id UUID,
	event_type VARCHAR(50),
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	event_details JSON
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
	log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	event_id BIGINT,
	user_id BIGINT,
	access_time TIMESTAMP,
	access_details VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityEvents (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  event_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Devices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  manufacture_date DATE,
  last_seen TIMESTAMP,
  device_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  alert_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  alert_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
